橭字的基本解释

橭
gū
古书上说的一种树，即山榆：“若欲杀其神，则以牡橭午贯象齿而沉之。”
树枝四布。

橭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gū］
［《廣韻》古胡切，平模，見。］
木名。山榆。

橭字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橭； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页555第14
【唐韻】古胡切【集韻】【韻會】攻乎切，?音孤。木名。　又【廣韻】苦胡切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】空胡切，?音枯。【類篇】牡橭，山楡也。【周禮·秋官】壺涿氏掌除水蟲，若欲殺其神，則以牡橭貫象齒而沈之。【註】橭讀爲枯。枯楡，木名。　又【玉篇】木四布也。　又【集韻】後五切【類篇】?古切，?音戸。木名。

考證：〔貫象齒而焚之。〕　謹照周禮原文焚改沈。
橭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
橭字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，即山榆；树枝四布。

橭
Basic explanation of words
橭
gū
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, namely Shan Yu: "If you want to kill its god, you can sink it by penetrating the elephant's teeth with the worm."
Four branches of cloth.
橭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gū］
["Guang Yun" Gu Hu cut, flat model, see you. ]
Wooden name. Mountain elm.
橭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橭; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 555 14
[Tang Yun] Gu Huqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Hui] Attacking almost cutting,? The sound is lonely. Wooden name.　 [Guang Yun] bitter Hu cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] empty Hu cut,? The sound is dry. 【Classes】Mu Ye, Shan Ye also. [Zhou Li·Qiuguan] Hu Zhuo's palm removes water worms. If you want to kill its god, you will use a stalk to penetrate the elephant teeth and sink it. [Note] 橭 is pronounced dry. Withered, wooden name.　[Jade Chapter] Mu Sibu Ye.　[Jiyun] Back Five Cuts [Class Pieces]? Ancient Cuts, Sounds. Wooden name. Textual research: [Burn it through the teeth of the elephant. 〕 　 I would like to burn to sink according to the original Zhou Li.
橭

Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
橭
Name meaning
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, namely mountain elm; its branches are covered with four cloths.
kū, gū
только в сочетаниях; см., напр. 牡橭
